name: people_counting
template: urisourcebin buffer_size=4096 name="source" ! flvdemux name=demux demux.video ! h264parse ! video/x-h264 ! tee name=t ! queue2 ! avdec_h264 ! videoconvert name="videoconvert" ! video/x-raw,format=BGRx ! queue leaky=upstream ! gvadetect ie-config=CPU_BIND_THREAD=NO model="{models[person_detection_2020R2][1][network]}" model-proc="{models[person_detection_2020R2][1][proc]}" name="detection" ! queue ! gvaclassify model="{models[person_reidentification_2021R1][1][network]}" model-proc="{models[person_reidentification_2021R1][1][proc]}" name="reidentification" ! queue ! gvametaconvert name="metaconvert" ! gvapython name="peoplecounting" module="custom_transforms/people_counting" class="PeopleCounting" ! queue ! gvametapublish name="destination" ! appsink name=appsink t. ! queue2 max-size-time=60500000000 ! splitmuxsink max-size-time=60500000000 name="splitmuxsink"
